item.title: TWOTS Take on San Francisco | Two Ts In A Pod with Teddi Mellencamp and Tamra Judge
item.description: Podcast Description Teddi and Tamra and Two Ts in a Pod are hitting the road and going live. Find out the special guests that will be on stage with them and why it’s a girls night out you dont want to miss. Get your tickets now at ticketmaster.com. January 25th at Palace of Fine Arts, San Francisco! See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Two Ts Presents: Ay Por Favor: Brofessor’s of the Year | Two Ts In A Pod with Teddi Mellencamp and Tamra Judge
item.description: Podcast Description Your favorite besties are back as they revisit their FIRST EVER live show in Boca Raton, Fl last weekend and all the fun they had. Alexia and Marysol can barely contain their excitement as they weigh in on Taylor Swift being named Time’s Person of the Year and their predictions with her relationship to Travis Kelce. They also dish on Taylor’s bestie, Selena Gomez’ new relationship with Benny Blanco and how they feel she needs to prioritize her happiness.

item.title: Introducing: Two Jersey Js with Jackie Goldschneider and Jennifer Fessler | Two Ts In A Pod with Teddi Mellencamp and Tamra Judge

From menopause to making the most of your 40's and 50's. Follow these fabulous women as they navigate family, friendships, and even frenemies! Chasing that spark in your life, motherhood, men, good sex, and finding satisfaction in everything.If being a Real Housewife feels overwhelming at times, be a friend to one.

item.description: Podcast Description The housewives universe is exploding with the use of Ozempic so Jackie and Jenn dive right into what makes them compete opposites on their views of the drug. Jenn gets real about how she landed in the hospital from taking semiglutides. And Jackie shares her fears and worries about Jenn using it. The ladies don’t hold back and discuss it ALL on our first episode of Two Jersey J’s!
